document_data.name: Field Guardians
document_data.mainbody: The '''Field Guardians'''  were an order of [[paladin]]s devoted to the teachings of [[Chauntea]]. As such, they valued compassion, just as much as courage.
document_data.Activities: Field Guardians spent much of their time assisting and protecting folk who lived in rural areas of [[Faer√ªn]].
